on reading compounds: 旗色【ハタイロ】situation, outlook, one's allegiance, affiliation, position
紅旗【コウキ】Red Flag (Chinese Communist Party bulletin)
kun reading compounds: 旗【はた】flag, pataka (banner), banner (administrative division of Inner Mongolia)
旗揚げ【はたあげ】raising an army, launching business
白旗【しらはた】white flag, truce flag, surrender flag
大会旗【たいかいはた】tournament flag
